channel.title: [PI] Minimap icon

item.title: [PI] Minimap icon
item.dc:creator: @xknightpk xknightpk
item.description:
@xknightpk wrote:

So I’m wondering how can I make my client hide the minimap dot icon for a player with a certain username. What do you guys think I should do?

Well here’s where it marks the dots

boolean flag2 = false; if(myPlayer.team != 0 && player.team != 0 && myPlayer.team == player.team) flag2 = true; if(flag1) markMinimap(mapDotFriend, j1, l3); else markMinimap(mapDotPlayer, j1, l3); } }

Read full topic
